name: One Button To Rule Them All (岸本 Kishimoto Studios)
name_original: One Button To Rule Them All (岸本 Kishimoto Studios)
description:
This is an interactive presentation that was created for a talk about one button games.

We think it is unpolished and buggy but it served its purpose: to present the topic and give people some game ideas. Consider it a first playable :).

Unfortunately, there is no narration/subtitles that replaces the speaker (yet) so some things might feel meaningless or out of context.

Depending on the feedback we receive, we might keep working on it, adding new actions, player animations and fixing bugs.
